titles.title: Healthcare Disclosure Act of 2007
Healthcare Disclosure Act of 2007
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to require that amounts paid for employer-provided coverage under accident or health plans be included on W-2 Forms.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: Healthcare Disclosure Act of 2007 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to require employers to include in employee wage statements (i.e., W-2 forms) the total amount paid for coverage under an accident or health plan which is excludable from gross income.
